sen.e: According to the "kugyo bunin (directory of the successive Imperial officials)," he was assigned to Uemon no kami in 810, and the governor of the Kai Province in 817 as a successor of FUJIWARA no Masakawa after being Ukone no shogen (Lieutenant of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), Kurodo (Chamberlain) and Umanosuke (Asst.
